long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When you shop on Amazon, it can be difficult to see who is selling a product, and where a seller is located. This information is on Amazon, just tucked away on a different page. This extension places that information in the product description, so you can see who you are doing business with.
